article.title: Accounting Firm Cuts Ties With Trump and Retracts Financial Statements

news.lede: The firm, Mazars USA, said in a letter that it could no longer stand behind the annual statements, which are central to an investigation by the New York attorney general.

article.title: Rave in a cave: Vietnam's Equation festival goes subterranean for 2022

news.lede: Taking place from April 8th to 10th, the lineup highlights acts from China, Thailand, the Philippines and beyond.
